data.actual_result: The flash settings reset to automatic everytime you auto-rotate your screen
data.expected_result: The flash settings should remain as it is (in this case remain off or on)
data.short_description: Auto-rotating the screen with in-app camera open, resets the flash to automatic mode (flash settings previously set to either off or on) [only works with a device having rear camera with flash]
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn on your devices' auto-rotation to on - Click on plus icon (+) to open add content panel and open the in-app camera - Set your flash to off or on from automatic by clicking on top left flash icon in the camera panel (it's set to automatic by default I guess) - Auto rotate your device and notice
